With flat sides, fenders stay where you want them to stay. It’s that simple. The Flender = flat fender. No air pumps. No deflating punctures. Always dependable. Always ready to protect. 

- Comes in 27”, 36” and 48” long
- 6” thick foamcore 
- Durable, UV-resistant outer shell
- Includes SS D-ring & a fender rope (choose your size)
- Ships directly to your door
- Best Use: Boats under 50’

Maximum protection for minimal effort, that’s what PilePad XL is all about. XL is our widest PilePad (27”), padding every exposure point so you can dock with confidence. All PilePads include sleek straps and buckles for easy, “no toolbox installation”.

- "No tool" installation with connected straps & buckles
- 2” thick foam easily wraps piling 
- Beveled edges for a premium look
- Durable, UV-resistant outer shell
- Add height with XL Links 
- Ships directly to your door
- Best Use: Bow/entry pilings, large pilings

A versatile size to easily pad just about anything. As our hybrid pad (14” wide) Mid is easier to manage than XL, and best applied in the midship area or on smaller pilings (Hamptons boaters, we’re talking to you…).

- "No tool" installation with connected straps & buckles
- Beveled edges for a premium look
- Durable, UV-resistant outer shell
- Add height with Mid Links 
- Ships directly to your door
- Best Use: Mid ship pilings, thin pilings

Whoever invented those black rubber dock strips didn’t care about your boat. We do. Our Slim+ is a renaissance in dock fenders. Slim+ is instant relief for your boat at the dock. Thick enough to keep you safe from barnacles, soft enough for the most custom paint job, and straps on without a single tool.

Choose Your Strap Length
Different applications need different strap sizes. Choose your preferred size at checkout. 

Short 24” objects with 9” diameter, or smaller
Standard 52” most dock applications
Long 72” (+$6/each) for odd shapes and unique locations

- Includes 2 straps
- Beveled edges for a premium look
- Durable, UV-resistant outer shell
- Connect Slim+ together for a larger pad
- Ships directly to your door
- Best Use: Dock pilings, bring-a-long fenders
